name: Don't leaf me behind (Guilherme S. Gama)
name_original: Don't leaf me behind (Guilherme S. Gama)
description:
Description:

Playing as paper sheet (former ex-leaf) and in order to save your Tree Mom you must return from the caothic metropolis, bringing with you the help of your beloved seedlings.

Controls: 

Keyboard/Mouse - WASD to move, Mouse to look, SPACE to jump

Controller - L analog to move, R analog to look, X/A button to jump

Project Details:

Don't leaf me behind  is a 48h jam game  made by a team of 5 for the Global Game Jam' 23  at FEUP (Porto).

All the gameplay and game scripts, audio & sprites were made by the Stafetas team.

Additional technical implementation, this projects  was done in Unity engine and includes and external packages such as: Cinemachine, New Input System, TextMeshPro, Timeline, DOT Tween. For the visuals the Universal Pipeline Shader Graph (URP) and VFX Graph packages were used.

The team:

  • Guilherme Gama - Lead Programmer & Game Designer
  • Rita Silva - Lead Artist Director & Game Artist
  • Letícia Oliveira - Lead UI/UX Developer & Story Writer
  • Eduardo Gonçalves - Game Artist & Story Writer
  • António Matos - Lead Technical Artist & Sound Designer

External Fonts:

  • Main Font -Candy Beans (Chequered Ink)
